sect2.title: Introduction to xinetd
sect2.para: xinetd is the eXtended InterNET services Daemon, a secure replacement for inetd.

screen.userinput: Aug 22 21:40:21 dps10 xinetd[2696]: Server /usr/sbin/in.rlogind is not executable [line=29] Aug 22 21:40:21 dps10 xinetd[2696]: Error parsing attribute server - DISABLING SERVICE [line=29] Aug 22 21:40:21 dps10 xinetd[2696]: Server /usr/sbin/in.rshd is not executable [line=42]

sect3.para: These errors are because most of the servers xinetd is trying to control are not installed yet.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The xinetd package contains xinetd, itox and xconv.pl.

sect3.title: xinetd
sect3.para: xinetd is the Internet services daemon.

sect3.title: itox
sect3.para: itox is a utility used for converting inetd.conf files to xinetd.conf format.

sect3.title: xconv.pl
sect3.para: xconv.pl is a Perl script used for converting inetd.conf files to xinetd.conf format, similar to itox.
